description: Replacement of the front wall and installation of a new sliding gate for off street parking following the removal of the existing front wall (Listed Building Consent)
decision_conditions: The development to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date on which the consent is granted.   REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) (A596 04 Rev A).  REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All materials to be used in the development shall match those as outlined on the approved plans:  A596 04 Rev A.  Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies Local Variation 7.4, 7B and 7C, policies 1.1 (g) and (h), 1.2 (f) and (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (Consolidated 2015). | Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the works permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.  REASON: To safeguard the architectural and/or historic interest of the building and the Bedford Park Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 7C of the Ealing Development Plan DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h) and 1.2 (g) of the Local Development Framework - Adopted Core Strategy (2012), policy 7.8 of the London Plan and the Bedford Park Conservation Area Management Plan (September 2007). | If hitherto unknown evidence of historic character that would be affected by the works hereby permitted is discovered or likely to be revealed, an appropriate record together with recommendations for dealing with it in the context of the scheme, shall be submitted in writing to the Local Planning Authority before any alterations take place.   Reason: To safeguard the character of the listed building, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.8 of The London Plan (2011) and polices 7.4 and 7C of the Adopted Development Management Plan (2013).
